abstract: Activists say both North Korea and South Korea are supporting peace walk across demilitarized zone by prominent women, including Gloria Steinem.
lead_paragraph: The women conceived the walk across the Demilitarized Zone to punctuate their desire for a permanent peace treaty to replace the armistice that halted — but technically never ended — the 1950-53 Korean War.

headline.main: Activists Say Both North Korea and South Korea Approve Women’s Peace Walk
headline.print_headline: Activists Say Both Koreas Approve Women’s Peace Walk

snippet: The women conceived the walk across the Demilitarized Zone to punctuate their desire for a permanent peace treaty to replace the armistice that halted — but technically never ended — the 1950-53 Korean War.
